replace_outof_vocab_words[source]

replace_outof_vocab_words(text, vocab, nlp=<spacy.lang.en.English object at 0x7fc6148dbe48>, extra_vocab=['-PRON-', '-pron-', '.', ',', ';'], special_tokens={'(': '-lrb-', ')': '-rrb-'})

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
patterns = [
    (r'.*ing$', 'VBG'),               # gerunds
    (r'.*ed$', 'VBD'),                # simple past
    (r'.*es$', 'VBZ'),                # 3rd singular present
    (r'.*ould$', 'MD'),               # modals
    (r'.*\'s$', 'NN$'),               # possessive nouns
    (r'.*s$', 'NNS'),                 # plural nouns
    (r'^-?[0-9]+(.[0-9]+)?$', 'CD'),  # cardinal numbers
    (r'.*', 'NN')                     # nouns (default)
]
{% endraw %}
